experiences.title: Full-stack Developer Intern
experiences.description: Developed an interactive educational website for students to practice AI-generated math problems, analyze their progress, and customize their learning. Used HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the frontend and PHP with MySQL for the backend. Acquired over 20 active users within the first three months of deployment.

experiences.title: Machine Learning Researcher
experiences.description: First-authored a research paper under review for the Journal of Medical Internet Research. Conducted a project analyzing social media content on Reddit related to Bird Flu outbreaks, collecting 2,000+ comments from 160 subreddits. Utilized Python Pandas for data processing, a fine-tuned BERT model with 94.2% accuracy for sentiment analysis, and BERTopic and LDA models for topic modeling.

experiences.title: AI Research Intern
experiences.description: Engineered a flexible 3D rendering program for psycholinguistics research, comparing human and large language model behaviors on spatial reasoning tasks.
